strings.ifItWasNotYou: If this wasn't you, please ignore this email.

userCreated.name: User creation

passwordReset.name: Password reset
passwordReset.title: Password reset requested - Jellyfin
passwordReset.someoneHasRequestedReset: Someone has recently requested a password reset on Jellyfin.
passwordReset.ifItWasYou: If this was you, enter the pin below into the prompt.
passwordReset.codeExpiry: The code will expire on {date}, at {time} UTC, which is in {expiresInMinutes}.

inviteEmail.toJoin: To join, follow the below link.
inviteEmail.inviteExpiry: This invite will expire on {date} at {time}, which is in {expiresInMinutes}, so act quick.

welcomeEmail.name: Welcome email
welcomeEmail.title: Welcome to Jellyfin
welcomeEmail.youCanLoginWith: You can login with the details below

emailConfirmation.title: Confirm your email - Jellyfin
emailConfirmation.clickBelow: Click the link below to confirm your email address and start using Jellyfin.
